name: Chenyang Lu 0001
content: Chenyang Lu's homepage AIHealth Short Bio Courses Research Papers Media Talks Software Students Awards Services Schedule CPSL Contact Chenyang Lu Director, AI for Health Institute (AIHealth) Fullgraf Professor of Computer Science & Engineering Professor of Anesthesiology, Medicine, Neurosurgery, Public Health, Washington University in St. Louis AI for Health: Institute, Research, Course, Symposium Director, Cyber-Physical Systems Laboratory (CPSL) Editor-in-Chief, ACM Transactions on Cyber-Physical Systems News [Talk] AI and Poverty: Harnessing Data to Understand Health Risks and Inequities [Keynote at NYU AI and Poverty Mini-Conference] [News] PhD student Claire Najjuuko received the Provost's Research Excellence Award [News] PhD student Ruiqi Wang received Google PhD Fellowship [Event] Panel: AI's Impact on Healthcare (WashU Law Legal Tech Week) [Event] AI for Health Symposium (Recording) on October 22, 2025 [News] RT-Xen paper won the Test of Time Award (Paper) [News] Joined the inaugural AI Advisory Board of WashU Law [Course] CSE 4109: Introduction to AI for Health [AIHealth Announcement] [Paper] Real-Time Video-Based Human Action Recognition on Embedded Platforms [EMSOFT'25] [News] Data Science Uncovers Patterns in Health Service Use Linked to Child Mortality [Press Release] [Paper] Patterns of Maternal and Child Health Services Utilization and Associated Socioeconomic Disparities in Sub-Saharan Africa.
